basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/BloodHound%20Enterprise/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution. The BloodHound Enterprise Microsoft Sentinel solution ingests your BloodHound Enterprise posture and attack paths into Microsoft Sentinel. Use the dashboards to track the Active Directory and Azure attack paths of your environment. Create alerts to detect when new attack paths emerge or new the exposure increases. **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 1, **Workbooks:** 2, **Analytic Rules:** 3 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for BloodHound Enterprise. You can get BloodHound Enterprise custom log data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

The Solution installs a parser that transforms the ingested data into Microsoft Sentinel normalized format. The normalized format enables better correlation of different types of data from different data sources to drive end-to-end outcomes seamlessly in security monitoring, hunting, incident investigation and response scenarios in Microsoft Sentinel.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs workbooks. Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data monitoring, analysis, and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into one or many data sources from Microsoft Sentinel and combine them into unified interactive experiences.
Gain insights into BloodHound Enterprise attack paths.
Gain insights into BloodHound Enterprise domain posture.
This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.
